ygData.messageBody:
It actually looks really good (I think). I've had a lot of people say its
the best effect they've ever seen. Afterlife has a few pics on thier board.
I took a few pics of mine, but they're on my home computer and I'm at work
right now.


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
60 Bard, Erollisi Marr

From: Mike.Roach@... [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]

Subject: [eqbards] Singing short sword


Does anyone have a picture of the particle effects on this sword or know a
url that has a shot? I'm curious about what it looks like.
